name: OCKColorStyle
desc: A concrete object that controls color constants.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a new color style with default values.

items.name: var black: UIColor
items.desc: A black color the system provides, with 0.0 white.

items.name: var clear: UIColor
items.desc: A clear color the system provides, with 0.0 white and 0.0 alpha.

items.name: var white: UIColor
items.desc: A white color the system provides, with 1.0 white.

items.name: var customGray: UIColor
items.desc: A gray color the system provides.

items.name: var customGray2: UIColor
items.desc: A shade of gray color the system provides.

items.name: var customGray3: UIColor
items.desc: A shade of gray color the system provides.

items.name: var customGray4: UIColor
items.desc: A shade of gray color the system provides.

items.name: var customGray5: UIColor
items.desc: A shade of gray color the system provides.

items.name: var customBlue: UIColor
items.desc: A blue color the system provides.

items.name: var label: UIColor
items.desc: A color the system provides for the forground of first-level static text, in a label.

items.name: var secondaryLabel: UIColor
items.desc: A color the system provides for the forground of second-level static text, in a label.

items.name: var tertiaryLabel: UIColor
items.desc: A color the system provides for the forground of third-level static text, in a label.

items.name: var customFill: UIColor
items.desc: A color the system provides for filling thin and small shapes.

items.name: var secondaryCustomFill: UIColor
items.desc: A color the system provides for filling medium-size shapes.

items.name: var tertiaryCustomFill: UIColor
items.desc: A color the system provides for filling large shapes.

items.name: var quaternaryCustomFill: UIColor
items.desc: A color the system provides for filling large areas that contain complex content.

items.name: var customBackground: UIColor
items.desc: A color the system provides for the backmost layer of the UI.

items.name: var secondaryCustomBackground: UIColor
items.desc: A color the system provides for the UI, one layer above the background layer.

items.name: var customGroupedBackground: UIColor
items.desc: A color the system provides for grouped UI content, for the backmost layer.

items.name: var secondaryCustomGroupedBackground: UIColor
items.desc: A color the system provides for grouped UI content, one layer above the background layer.

items.name: var tertiaryCustomGroupedBackground: UIColor
items.desc: A color the system provides for grouped UI content, one layer above the secondary background layer.

items.name: var separator: UIColor
items.desc: The color the system provides for foreground colors of thin border or divider lines.
